src: Ford accepts the fait accompli with good grace.
mt: Ford acceptă situația de facto cu grație.
backtranslation: Ford accepts the de facto situation with grace.

src: Falstaff, pleased to find himself not the only dupe, proclaims that all the world is folly, and all are figures of fun ("Tutto nel mondo è burla... Tutti gabbati!... Ma ride ben chi ride La risata final." / "Everything in the world is a jest... but he laughs well who laughs the final laugh").
mt: Falstaff, bucuros că nu este singura victimă, proclamă că toată lumea este o nebunie și toți sunt niște figuri de râs („Tutto nel mondo è burla... Tutti gabbati!... Ma ride ben chi ride La risata final.” / „Totul în lume este o glumă... dar râde bine cine râde ultimul”).
backtranslation: Falstaff, glad that he is not the only victim, proclaims that the whole world is madness and everyone is a laughing stock ("Tutto nel mondo è burla... Tutti gabbati!.... Ma ride ben chi ride La risata finale." / "Everything in the world is a joke... But laughs well who laughs last").

src: The entire company repeats his proclamation in an exuberant ten-voice fugue.
mt: Întreaga companie repetă proclamația sa într-o fugă exuberantă pe zece voci.
backtranslation: The entire company repeats his proclamation in an exuberant ten-part fugue.

src: They won all their group matches to finish top of the pool.
mt: Au câștigat toate meciurile din grupă și au terminat pe primul loc.
backtranslation: They won all their group matches and finished first.

src: After defeating France in the quarter-finals, they lost to the eventual tournament winners South Africa in the semi-finals.
mt: După ce au învins Franța în sferturile de finală, au pierdut în semifinală în fața Africii de Sud, care a câștigat ulterior turneul.
backtranslation: After beating France in the quarter-finals, they lost in the semi-finals to South Africa, who went on to win the tournament.

src: The arrangement of Thiele and Ladiges was not accepted by George, and was discarded in his 1999 revision.
mt: Aranjamentul lui Thiele și Ladiges nu a fost acceptat de George și a fost abandonat în revizuirea sa din 1999.
backtranslation: Thiele and Ladiges' arrangement was not accepted by George and was abandoned in his 1999 revision.

src: Under George's 1999 arrangement, B. epica's placement was as follows:
mt: Conform aranjamentului lui George din 1999, plasarea lui B. epica era următoarea:
backtranslation: According to George's 1999 arrangement, the placement of B. epica was as follows:

src: The Outsider also grants his mark, and special abilities, to other characters.
mt: Outsiderul își acordă, de asemenea, semnul și abilități speciale altor personaje.
backtranslation: The Outsider also bestows their mark and special abilities on other characters.

src: Smith described the character as an amoral figure who grants abilities, but leaves the choice of how to use them up to the recipient.
mt: Smith a descris personajul ca fiind o figură amorală care oferă abilități, dar lasă la latitudinea destinatarului alegerea modului în care acestea vor fi folosite.
backtranslation: Smith described the character as an amoral figure who offers abilities, but leaves it up to the recipient to choose how they will be used.

src: Devil May Cry begins with Dante (Drew Coombs) being attacked in his office by a mysterious woman named Trish (Sara Lafleur).
mt: Devil May Cry începe cu Dante (Drew Coombs) fiind atacat în biroul său de o femeie misterioasă pe nume Trish (Sara Lafleur).
backtranslation: Devil May Cry begins with Dante (Drew Coombs) being attacked in his office by a mysterious woman named Trish (Sara Lafleur).

src: He impresses her by easily brushing off her assault, and explains that for years, he has hunted demons in pursuit of the ones who killed his mother and brother.
mt: El o impresionează prin faptul că respinge cu ușurință atacul ei și explică faptul că, ani de zile, a vânat demoni în căutarea celor care i-au ucis mama și fratele.
backtranslation: He impresses her by easily fending off her attack and explains that for years he has hunted demons in search of those who killed his mother and brother.

src: Trish explains that her attack was a test, and that the demon emperor Mundus (Tony Daniels), whom Dante holds responsible for the deaths of his family, is planning to cross over into the human world after centuries of imprisonment.
mt: Trish explică faptul că atacul ei a fost un test și că împăratul demon Mundus (Tony Daniels), pe care Dante îl consideră responsabil pentru moartea familiei sale, plănuiește să treacă în lumea umană după secole de încarcerare.
backtranslation: Trish explains that her attack was a test and that the demon Emperor Mundus (Tony Daniels), whom Dante holds responsible for the death of his family, is planning to cross over into the human world after centuries of imprisonment.

src: Rainbow is a documentary filmmaker.
mt: Rainbow este un regizor de documentare.
backtranslation: Rainbow is a documentary filmmaker.

src: Liz O'Rourke says she is now working with the mentally disabled (although she is later revealed to be a midwife in the episode "Father Figure").
mt: Liz O'Rourke spune că lucrează acum cu persoane cu dizabilități mintale (deși mai târziu se dezvăluie că este moașă în episodul „Figură paternă”).
backtranslation: Liz O'Rourke says she now works with mentally disabled people (although it is later revealed that she is a midwife in the episode "Father Figure").

src: Trish Skye says she had problems but has been clean and sober for two years; she works at a funeral home and is a freelance writer.
mt: Trish Skye spune că a avut probleme, dar este curată și trează de doi ani; lucrează la o casă funerară și este scriitoare independentă.
backtranslation: Trish Skye says she's had problems but has been clean and sober for two years; she works in a funeral home and is a freelance writer.

src: Before joining Bernard in Paris, Rosa stays in a flat in London for several weeks.
mt: Înainte de a se alătura lui Bernard la Paris, Rosa stă câteva săptămâni într-un apartament din Londra.
backtranslation: Before joining Bernard in Paris, Rosa stays for a few weeks in a flat in London.

src: Now that she has no intention of honouring the agreement of her passport, which was to return to South Africa within a year, she openly introduces herself as Burger's daughter.
mt: Acum, că nu are nicio intenție de a respecta acordul din pașaportul ei, care era să se întoarcă în Africa de Sud în termen de un an, se prezintă deschis ca fiind fiica lui Burger.
backtranslation: Now that she has no intention of honoring the agreement in her passport that she was to return to South Africa within a year, she openly introduces herself as Burger's daughter.

src: This attracts the attention of the media and she attends several political events.
mt: Acest lucru atrage atenția presei, iar ea participă la mai multe evenimente politice.
backtranslation: This attracts media attention and she attends several political events.

src: Following Roy Hodgson's appointment, The Sun mocked his rhotacism manner of speech with a "Bwing on the Euwos!" front-page headline.
mt: În urma numirii lui Roy Hodgson, ziarul The Sun i-a ironizat rotacismul cu un titlu pe prima pagină: „Bwing on the Euwos!” (Să vină Euro!).
backtranslation: Following Roy Hodgson's appointment, The Sun newspaper derided his rotacism with a front-page headline: "Bwing on the Euwos!" (Here comes the Euro!).

src: The FA called the headline "unacceptable" and more than 100 people complained to the Press Complaints Commission.
mt: FA a numit titlul „inacceptabil”, iar peste 100 de persoane s-au plâns la Comisia de Plângeri din Presă.
backtranslation: The FA called the headline "unacceptable" and more than 100 people complained to the Press Complaints Commission.

src: As a response to this, in 2017 boats off the British Columbia coast now have a minimum approach distance of 200 metres compared to the previous 100 metres.
mt: Ca răspuns la aceasta, în 2017, ambarcațiunile de pe coasta British Columbia au acum o distanță minimă de apropiere de 200 de metri, comparativ cu cei 100 de metri anteriori.
backtranslation: In response to this, in 2017, boats on the British Columbia coast now have a minimum approach distance of 200 meters, up from 100 meters previously.

src: This new rule complements Washington State's minimum approach zone of 180 metres that has been in effect since 2011.
mt: Această nouă regulă completează zona de apropiere minimă de 180 de metri stabilită de statul Washington, care este în vigoare din 2011.
backtranslation: This new rule complements Washington State's 180-meter minimum approach zone, which has been in effect since 2011.

src: If a whale approaches a vessel it must be placed in neutral until the whale passes.
mt: Dacă o balenă se apropie de o navă, aceasta trebuie pusă în punct mort până când balena trece.
backtranslation: If a whale approaches a ship, the ship must be put in neutral until the whale passes.

src: A number of locations in and around Dallas were used in production.
mt: O serie de locații din Dallas și din împrejurimi au fost folosite în producție.
backtranslation: A number of locations in and around Dallas were used in the production.

src: An office in Renaissance Tower was used for the OCP interior of; the company's exterior is Dallas City Hall, modified with matte paintings to appear taller.
mt: Un birou din Turnul Renașterii a fost folosit pentru interiorul OCP; exteriorul companiei este Primăria din Dallas, modificată cu picturi mate pentru a părea mai înaltă.
backtranslation: A Renaissance Tower office was used for OCP's interior; the company's exterior is the Dallas City Hall, modified with matte paintings to appear taller.

src: The OCP elevator was that of the Plaza of the Americas.
mt: Liftul OCP era cel din Plaza of the Americas.
backtranslation: The OCP elevator was the one in Plaza of the Americas.

src: Although the traditional accounts are in agreement that Lydda almost immediately fell into obscurity following the founding of Ramla, narratives vary about the extent of Sulayman's efforts to transfer Lydda's inhabitants to Ramla, some holding that he only demolished a church in Lydda and others that he demolished the city altogether.
mt: Deși relatările tradiționale sunt de acord că Lydda a căzut aproape imediat în obscuritate după fondarea Ramlei, relatările variază cu privire la amploarea eforturilor lui Sulayman de a transfera locuitorii din Lydda la Ramla, unele susținând că acesta a demolat doar o biserică din Lydda, iar altele că a demolat orașul în întregime.
backtranslation: Although the traditional accounts agree that Lydda fell almost immediately into obscurity after the founding of Ramla, accounts vary on the extent of Sulayman's efforts to transfer the inhabitants of Lydda to Ramla, with some claiming that he demolished only one church in Lydda, and others that he demolished the city entirely.

src: Al-Ya'qubi (d. 839) noted Sulayman razed the houses of Lydda's inhabitants to force their relocation to Ramla and punished those who resisted.
mt: Al-Ya'qubi (d. 839) a remarcat că Sulayman a dărâmat casele locuitorilor din Lydda pentru a-i forța să se mute la Ramla și i-a pedepsit pe cei care s-au opus.
backtranslation: Al-Ya'qubi (d. 839) noted that Sulayman demolished the houses of the inhabitants of Lydda to force them to move to Ramla and punished those who resisted.

src: In the words of al-Jahshiyari, Sulayman "founded the town of al-Ramla and its mosque and thus caused the ruin of Lod
mt: În cuvintele lui al-Jahshiyari, Sulayman "a fondat orașul al-Ramla și moscheea sa și astfel a cauzat ruina orașului Lod"
backtranslation: In the words of al-Jahshiyari, Sulayman "founded the city of al-Ramla and its mosque and thus caused the ruin of Lod"

src: Rolling Stone includes the album and several songs on various "best of" lists, such as:
mt: Rolling Stone include albumul și câteva melodii pe diverse liste „cele mai bune”, cum ar fi:
backtranslation: Rolling Stone includes the album and several songs on various "best of" lists, such as:

src: The Tactical Patrol Force (TPF) of the New York City Police Department arrived to free the police trapped inside the Stonewall.
mt: Forța de Patrulare Tactică (TPF) a Departamentului de Poliție al orașului New York a sosit pentru a-i elibera pe polițiștii prinși în interiorul Stonewall.
backtranslation: The New York City Police Department's Tactical Patrol Force (TPF) has arrived to free the officers trapped inside Stonewall.

src: One officer's eye was cut and a few others were bruised from being struck by flying debris.
mt: Un ofițer a fost rănit la ochi, iar alții câțiva au suferit vânătăi din cauza resturilor zburătoare.
backtranslation: One officer sustained eye injuries and several others suffered bruises from flying debris.

src: Bob Kohler, who was walking his dog by the Stonewall that night, saw the TPF arrive:
mt: Bob Kohler, care își plimba câinele pe lângă Stonewall în acea noapte, a văzut sosind TPF:
backtranslation: Bob Kohler, who was walking his dog near Stonewall that night, saw the TPF arrive:

src: Waziri and Afonja save Tawa.
mt: Waziri și Afonja o salvează pe Tawa.
backtranslation: Waziri and Afonja save Tawa.

src: Waziri subsequently presents his account of the investigation to the British, who instruct him to withhold Aderopo's identity; he reluctantly agrees to do so for the sake of a peaceful independence.
mt: Ulterior, Waziri prezintă britanicilor relatarea sa despre investigație, iar aceștia îi cer să nu dezvăluie identitatea lui Aderopo; el acceptă cu reticență să facă acest lucru pentru o independență pașnică.
backtranslation: Later, Waziri presents his account of the investigation to the British, who ask him not to reveal Aderopo's identity; he reluctantly agrees to do so for peaceful independence.

src: Diller planned on a new Star Trek series forming the cornerstone for a new television network.
mt: Diller plănuia ca o nouă serie Star Trek să fie piatra de temelie a unei noi rețele de televiziune.
backtranslation: Diller planned for a new Star Trek series to be the cornerstone of a new television network.

src: Though Paramount was reluctant to abandon its work on the film, Roddenberry wanted to bring many of the production staff from the original series to work on the new show, titled Star Trek: Phase II.
mt: Deși Paramount era reticentă să renunțe la munca sa la film, Roddenberry a vrut să aducă o mare parte din personalul de producție al seriei originale pentru a lucra la noul serial, intitulat Star Trek: Phase II.
backtranslation: Although Paramount was reluctant to let go of his work on the movie, Roddenberry wanted to bring in much of the original series' production staff to work on the new series, titled Star Trek: Phase II.

src: Chilean devil ray (M. tarapacana)
mt: Diavolul de mare chilian (M. tarapacana)
backtranslation: Chilean sea devil (M. tarapacana)

src: Cory Edwards chose to approach the film predominantly as an action/comedy, instead of as a typical animated film, and wrote the script to appeal to audiences of any age like many of the films produced by Pixar or Disney.
mt: Cory Edwards a ales să abordeze filmul predominant ca pe o acțiune/comedie, în loc de un film de animație tipic, și a scris scenariul pentru a atrage publicul de orice vârstă, la fel ca multe dintre filmele produse de Pixar sau Disney.
backtranslation: Cory Edwards chose to approach the movie predominantly as an action/comedy, rather than a typical animated movie, and wrote the script to appeal to audiences of all ages, like many of the movies produced by Pixar or Disney.

src: Bugs Bunny, Road Runner, The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle and Friends, The Muppets, The Simpsons and The Incredibles (2004) have all been cited as inspirations for the film.
mt: Bugs Bunny, Road Runner, Aventurile lui Rocky și Bullwinkle și prietenii, Muppets, Simpsonii și Incredibilii (2004) au fost citați ca surse de inspirație pentru film.
backtranslation: Bugs Bunny, The Road Runner, The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle and Friends, The Muppets, The Simpsons and The Incredibles (2004) were cited as inspirations for the movie.

src: By the early 1930s, Orizaba's typical route had remained virtually the same, though Nassau and Tampico were dropped as ports of call.
mt: Până la începutul anilor 1930, ruta tipică a navei Orizaba a rămas practic aceeași, deși Nassau și Tampico au fost eliminate ca porturi de escală.
backtranslation: By the early 1930s, the Orizaba's typical route remained virtually the same, although Nassau and Tampico were eliminated as ports of call.

src: It was in this period that American poet Hart Crane leapt to his death from Orizaba.
mt: În această perioadă, poetul american Hart Crane s-a aruncat de pe Orizaba, murind.
backtranslation: Around this time, the American poet Hart Crane threw himself off Orizaba to his death.

src: At around noon on 27 April 1932, while the ship was headed to New York—some 275 miles (443 km) north of Havana and 10 miles (16 km) off the Florida coast—Crane, clad in pajamas and overcoat, climbed the rail at the stern of the ship and plunged into the ocean.
mt: În jurul prânzului, pe 27 aprilie 1932, în timp ce nava se îndrepta spre New York - la aproximativ 275 de mile (443 km) nord de Havana și la 10 mile (16 km) de coasta Floridei - Crane, îmbrăcat în pijama și palton, s-a urcat pe balustrada din pupa navei și s-a aruncat în ocean.
backtranslation: At around noon on April 27, 1932, while the ship was bound for New York - about 275 miles (443 km) north of Havana and 10 miles (16 km) off the Florida coast - Crane, dressed in pajamas and overcoat, climbed over the ship's stern rail and jumped overboard.

src: How you use your eyes, your position, and how you maximize camera angles... I didn't know those things before."
mt: „Cum îți folosești ochii, poziția și cum maximizezi unghiurile camerei... Nu știam aceste lucruri înainte.”
backtranslation: "How you use your eyes, your stance, and how you maximize camera angles.... I didn't know these things before."

src: To prepare for the role of a courtesan, she learned different styles of ballroom dances and trained in pole dance for three months.
mt: Pentru a se pregăti pentru rolul de curtezană, a învățat diferite stiluri de dansuri de salon și s-a antrenat la pole dance timp de trei luni.
backtranslation: To prepare for her role as a courtesan, she learned different ballroom dance styles and trained pole dancing for three months.

src: Critic Julia
mt: Criticul Julia
backtranslation: Critic Julia

src: On August 26, George H. W. Bush toured devastated areas of Louisiana with Governor Edwin Edwards.
mt: Pe 26 august, George H. W. Bush a vizitat zonele devastate din Louisiana împreună cu guvernatorul Edwin Edwards.
backtranslation: On August 26, George H.W. Bush visited the devastated areas of Louisiana with Governor Edwin Edwards.

src: President Bush remarked, "The destruction from this storm goes beyond anything we have known in recent years," but noted that damage was less severe than in Florida.
mt: Președintele Bush a remarcat: „Distrugerile provocate de această furtună depășesc orice am cunoscut în ultimii ani”, dar a menționat că pagubele au fost mai puțin grave decât în Florida.
backtranslation: President Bush remarked, "The damage from this storm exceeds anything we have seen in recent years," but noted that the damage was less severe than in Florida.

src: After his visit to Louisiana, President Bush declared only Terrebonne Parish as a disaster area, but later included 34 other parishes under this declaration.
mt: După vizita sa în Louisiana, președintele Bush a declarat doar parohia Terrebonne zonă de dezastru, dar ulterior a inclus alte 34 de parohii în această declarație.
backtranslation: After his visit to Louisiana, President Bush declared only Terrebonne Parish a disaster area, but later included 34 other parishes in the declaration.

src: When general elections were held in July 2003, the CPP won, while FUNCINPEC polled 20.8 percent of the popular vote and secured 26 out of a total of 120 parliamentary seats.
mt: Când au avut loc alegeri generale în iulie 2003, CPP a câștigat, în timp ce FUNCINPEC a obținut 20,8% din voturile populare și a obținut 26 din totalul de 120 de locuri parlamentare.
backtranslation: When a general election was held in July 2003, the CPP won, while FUNCINPEC obtained 20.8% of the popular vote and won 26 out of 120 parliamentary seats.

src: This marked an 11 percentage point drop in FUNCINPEC's share of the popular vote compared with 1998.
mt: Aceasta a marcat o scădere de 11 puncte procentuale a cotei de voturi obținute de FUNCINPEC față de 1998.
backtranslation: This marked an 11 percentage point drop in FUNCINPEC's share of the vote since 1998.

src: Palaces are usually arranged around one or more courtyards, with their façades facing inwards; some examples are adorned with sculpture.
mt: Palatele sunt de obicei aranjate în jurul uneia sau mai multor curți interioare, cu fațadele orientate spre interior; unele exemple sunt împodobite cu sculpturi.
backtranslation: Palaces are usually arranged around one or more inner courtyards, with facades facing inwards; some examples are adorned with sculptures.

src: Some palaces possess associated hieroglyphic descriptions that identify them as the royal residences of named rulers.
mt: Unele palate posedă descrieri hieroglifice asociate care le identifică drept reședințe regale ale unor conducători numiți.
backtranslation: Some palaces have associated hieroglyphic descriptions which identify them as royal residences of appointed rulers.

src: The Inquisition post mortem held after Minsterworth's execution casts light upon his land-holding, much of which was held directly off John of Gaunt, son of King Edward III.
mt: Inquiziția post-mortem efectuată după execuția lui Minsterworth aruncă lumină asupra proprietăților sale funciare, o mare parte din acestea fiind deținute direct de la John de Gaunt, fiul regelui Eduard al III-lea.
backtranslation: The post-mortem inquest carried out after Minsterworth's execution sheds light on his land holdings, much of which was held directly from John de Gaunt, son of King Edward III.

src: This was particularly concentrated in the southwest of England.
mt: Acest lucru a fost concentrat în special în sud-vestul Angliei.
backtranslation: This was particularly concentrated in the South West of England.

src: Daniel feels ignored by his father, who has chosen Alexis to be his best man.
mt: Daniel se simte ignorat de tatăl său, care l-a ales pe Alexis să-i fie cavaler de onoare.
backtranslation: Daniel feels ignored by his father, who has chosen Alexis to be his best man.

src: Christina McKinney (Ashley Jensen), MODE's seamstress, reunites with her husband Stuart (Derek Riddell) after leaving him in Scotland years ago; he reveals he is dying of a rare disease which requires a $100,000 operation.
mt: Christina McKinney (Ashley Jensen), croitoreasa de la MODE, se reîntâlnește cu soțul ei, Stuart (Derek Riddell), după ce l-a părăsit în Scoția cu ani în urmă; el îi dezvăluie că este pe moarte din cauza unei boli rare, care necesită o operație de 100.000 de dolari.
backtranslation: MODE seamstress Christina McKinney (Ashley Jensen) reunites with her husband Stuart (Derek Riddell) after leaving him in Scotland years ago; he reveals he is dying of a rare disease that requires a $100,000 operation.

src: Mistress Quickly rushes in, shouting that Ford has returned home unexpectedly with a retinue of henchmen to catch his wife's lover.
mt: Doamna Quickly intră în fugă, strigând că Ford s-a întors acasă pe neașteptate cu o suită de oameni de încredere pentru a-l prinde pe iubitul soției sale.
backtranslation: Mrs. Quickly rushes in, shouting that Ford has returned home unexpectedly with a retinue of henchmen to catch his wife's lover.

src: Falstaff hides first behind the screen, but realizes that Ford will likely look for him there.
mt: Falstaff se ascunde mai întâi în spatele paravanului, dar își dă seama că Ford probabil îl va căuta acolo.
backtranslation: Falstaff hides behind the screen first, but realizes that Ford will probably look for him there.

src: The women urge him to hide in the laundry basket, which he does.
mt: Femeile îl îndeamnă să se ascundă în coșul de rufe, ceea ce și face.
backtranslation: The women urge him to hide in the laundry basket, which he does.

src: In that year he was seen by Arthur Sullivan and, separately, by W. S. Gilbert, in performances of their one-act comic opera Trial by Jury.
mt: În acel an, el a fost văzut de Arthur Sullivan și, separat, de W. S. Gilbert, în spectacolele operei lor comice într-un act, Trial by Jury.
backtranslation: That year, he was seen by Arthur Sullivan and, separately, W. S. Gilbert, in performances of their one-act comic opera, Trial by Jury.

src: Impressed, they engaged him to play the comic lead in their new, full-length work, The Sorcerer.
mt: Impresionați, l-au angajat să joace rolul principal comic în noua lor lucrare de lungă durată, „Vrăjitorul”.
backtranslation: Impressed, they hired him to play the comic lead in their new long-gestating work, "The Wizard".

src: Thereafter, Grossmith created the leading comic role in each of Gilbert and Sullivan's long-running comic operas until The Yeomen of the Guard, which closed in 1889.
mt: Ulterior, Grossmith a creat rolul comic principal în fiecare dintre operele comice de lungă durată ale lui Gilbert și Sullivan, până la „The Yeomen of the Guard”, care s-a încheiat în 1889.
backtranslation: Thereafter, Grossmith created the comic lead in each of Gilbert and Sullivan's long-running Gilbert and Sullivan comic operas until The Yeomen of the Guard, which ended in 1889.

src: While returning home, Sudeep kidnaps and strangles Nani to death, making his death look like an accident.
mt: În timp ce se întorcea acasă, Sudeep îl răpește și îl strangulează pe Nani, făcând ca moartea acestuia să pară un accident.
backtranslation: While returning home, Sudeep kidnaps and strangles Nani, making his death look like an accident.

src: Before dying, Nani curses Sudeep, swearing to kill Sudeep if he tries to hurt Bindu.
mt: Înainte de a muri, Nani îl blestemă pe Sudeep, jurând să-l omoare dacă va încerca să o rănească pe Bindu.
backtranslation: Before he dies, Nani curses Sudeep, vowing to kill him if he tries to harm Bindu.

src: Unaware of the incident, Bindu confesses her love for the dying Nani by phone; it is the last thing Nani hears before he dies.
mt: Fără să știe de incident, Bindu își mărturisește dragostea pentru Nani, care este pe moarte, prin telefon; este ultimul lucru pe care Nani îl aude înainte de a muri.
backtranslation: Unaware of the incident, Bindu confesses her love for the dying Nani over the phone; it is the last thing Nani hears before she dies.

src: When Amir does not return, Tati and her aunt are worried: as Tati saw Amir with Omi, she fears that the two have run away together.
mt: Când Amir nu se întoarce, Tati și mătușa ei sunt îngrijorate: deoarece Tati l-a văzut pe Amir cu Omi, se tem că cei doi au fugit împreună.
backtranslation: When Amir doesn't come back, Tati and her aunt are worried: because Tati saw Amir with Omi, they fear that the two have run away together.

src: Heartbroken, she intends to return to Cigading.
mt: Cu inima frântă, intenționează să se întoarcă la Cigading.
backtranslation: Heartbroken, he plans to return to Cigading.

src: The rare formal social events in the Pooters' lives are particular magnets for misfortune.
mt: Rarele evenimente sociale formale din viața familiei Pooter sunt adevărate generatoare de ghinion.
backtranslation: The rare formal social events in the Pooter family's life are real bad luck generators.

src: They receive an invitation from the Lord Mayor of London to attend a ball at the Mansion House for "Representatives of Trade and Commerce".
mt: Aceștia primesc o invitație din partea Lord Mayorului Londrei pentru a participa la un bal la Mansion House, dedicat „Reprezentanților Comerțului și Industriei”.
backtranslation: They receive an invitation from the Lord Mayor of London to attend a ball at the Mansion House, dedicated to the 'Representatives of Trade and Industry'.

src: †Mammuthus primigenius (woolly mammoth)
mt: †Mammuthus primigenius (mamut linos)
backtranslation: †Mammuthus primigenius (mammoth linos)
